page.title: 15Arts & Crafts in Alstonfield
page.content:
There are two arts and crafts shops in Alstonefield. One is by Alstonefield Post Office and sells pictures and paintings. The other is near the old water pump and sells weavings, antiques and dried flower arrangements. There are flower arranging classes at Warslow Middle School on Thursday evenings.
Professional and Amateur Artists and Craftsmen working in the Milldale and Alstonfield areas include 2 men who do design, layouts, exhibitions, graphic designs, book illustrations, photographic work - professionally. There are also professional and amateur landscape painters both male and female. Amateurs also include Ceramic workers, spinners, weavers, woodcarvers and a portrait painter.
